org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity.support.AeFCTHandler

Packages that use AeFCTHandler
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity.support Includes supporting bpel objects which aren't properly activities.  
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.visitors Classes that visit a tree of BPEL implementation objects and save or restore their state.  
 

Uses of AeFCTHandler in org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity.support
 

Subclasses of AeFCTHandler in org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity.support
 class AeCompensationHandler
          Models the compensateHandler that is part of a scope or process.
 class AeCoordinatorCompensationHandler
          Compensation handler for a coordinated invoke activity.
 class AeDefaultFaultHandler
          Implementation of CatchAll fault handler.
 class AeFaultHandler
          Models the catch and catchAll providing a place to store the child activity for the fault.
 class AeImplicitCompensationHandler
          Implements the logic for the implicit compensation handler.
 class AeImplicitFaultHandler
          Implements the implicit fault handling routine which is simply to run the default compensation routine followed by rethrowing of the fault.
 class AeImplicitTerminationHandler
          Implicit version of termination handler that contains the default compensate activity
 class AeTerminationHandler
          TerminationHandler provides explicit way of providing behavior for a scope that is being terminated.
 class AeWSBPELFaultHandler
          Impl of fault handler for WS-BPEL 2.0
